text.div:
Care Connect Ethnic Category

A ValueSet to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a persons ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2016 HL7 UK

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-EthnicCategory-1

name: Care Connect Ethnic Category
description: A ValueSet to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a persons ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
